ingredients.ingredient: 8 sweet potatoes, sliced lengthwise into quarters

cookingTips: Cut potatoes evenly for uniform cooking and consistent texture
Toss with oil and seasoning just before baking to prevent sogginess
Arrange in a single layer without overlapping for maximum crispness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on proper cutting technique and seasoning distribution to achieve golden, crispy exterior with tender interior.
